Description:
[Regression]Select "Value of this data item" in map will lead the exception 

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070607-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a data item
2, Binding it with a dataset
3, Select the dataitem and specify the map in property editor
4, Select the ""Value of this data item" in map condition

Expected result:
No exception occurs is there is no value

Actual result:
Exception occurs
